subject: Support Haptic Feedback
description_text:
Hello, i bought the haptic feedbacks from amazon and i got the control box which is in the packages from the Reators. So my problem is that i cant connect the haptic with my pc. When i open the simsonn manager it says that my control box is in upgrade mode. I did what it says but i still have the same issue. Also simhib doenst recongnise the reactors. I need some help please. 
 
 
 Sincerely 
 Andy

conversations.body_text: Hi Andreas. balan,  Please provide your order number. If you are using the ProX Ultra, release the upgrade button on the main controller and then reconnect the USB cable to enter normal mode.Â
